Dating: ROMAN PERIOD (not before); ROMAN PERIOD ?; ISLAMIC PERIOD (not after)
Name: Glass flask
Description: This glass flask comes from the excavations of W. F. Petrie at Tell el-Yahudiyah in 1905-1906. It was made according to the "millefiori" technique (1000 flowers); that is to say by the melting of sticks of white glass in a brown basis. The dating of the piece is not certain: Could one suggest the end of the Roman Period or even the beginning of the Islamic Period?
